statements: DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-01' AND device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-02' AND device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-03' AND device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp < '2021-02-01' AND energy_consumed > 1000;
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionTrends WHERE trend_id IN (SELECT trend_id FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100)
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE pattern_name = 'Peak Hours' AND description LIKE '%high consumption%';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_trends WHERE trend_type = 'seasonal' AND start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location='New York' AND consumption_kwh > 1000;
DELETE FROM Locations WHERE city='London' AND country='UK';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_locations WHERE region = 'North America' AND location_id NOT IN (SELECT location_id FROM energy_devices);
